He said.
'I don't know the way.'
The governor said.
"How was the path born?
He was speechless.
The state said.
"I really don't know it.
The teacher said.
"Although Xiu Cai has nothing to say...
He understood Mucilinda's position.
It's just a minor final move.

source_sentence: 徑山當時若見睦州道果然不知。
translation: If Jingshan had seen that Mucilinda really didn't know, he would have just handed his palm and laughed.
He simply stroked his palm and laughed out loud.
He could just take Mucilinda and not be at a disadvantage.

source_sentence: 大慧普覺禪師住徑山能仁禪院語錄卷第四
translation: Record of the Chan Master Dahui Pujue's Stay at the Nengren Chan Institute in Jingshan, Volume 4
